biotools.summary: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | A Model Based Tool to Detect Tandem Repeats | ULTRA Locates Tandemly Repetitive Areas | To contribute to ULTRA development, you want to be on the develop branch, which is where we are currently integrating feature branches. For more information, see the ULTRA wiki
